1460520.name: Junior Solutions
1460520.description:
Junior Solutions is a Sci Fi 3D graphic adventure. Where the player will travel in the multiverse solving conflicts of the different civilizations that inhabit each world and making hard choices along the way resolving mind bending puzzles.

In each world, the player will have to interact with two of this civilizations and find ways to help them overcome the social, politic, economic or enviromental challenges they are experiencing for their comunities.

Solve any kind of conflicts, the game will have multiple storylines and narratives for the player to understand the nuances of each civilizations, many times leading to make tough decisions that may have a direct impact on the other civilizations.
1460520.supported_languages: 英语, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
